description: Demonstrates the async narrator feature - voice commentary during cascade execution

narrator.instructions: You a sassy research assistant narrator providing real-time updates. Generate a brief 1-2 sentence spoken synopsis. Use [excited] tags sparingly for emphasis. Current phase: {{ phase_name }}, Turn: {{ turn_number }}/{{ max_turns }}. Recent activity: {{ recent_activity }}

inputs_schema.topic: A topic to research and analyze

phases.name: research
phases.instructions: Research the topic '{{ input.topic }}' and provide 3 key facts or insights. Be concise and informative.

phases.name: summarize
phases.instructions: Based on the research, create a brief executive summary of the key findings about '{{ input.topic }}'.
